emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait of groom John Moore and bride Ophelia Berrien Moore cutting three tiered cake, with two women, possibly Mrs. Fred C. Berrien on left and Mrs. Ada Fluellen on right, in Central Baptist Church
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 1, 1953, pg. 10 reads: Berrien-Moore Wedding -Mr. and Mrs. John Moore cut their wedding cake at the charming reception which followed their wedding in Central Baptist Church recently. The Rev. Cornell E. Talley officiated.  The bride is the former Ophelia Berrien, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Fred C. Berrien; the groom is the son of Mrs. Ada Fluellen.  The bridal gown was of handsome skinner satin with billowing tulle and Chantilly face. - Harris Photo."
